review_data.title: Never seen something like this in my life, stay away!
review_data.content: I was a returning customer of the restaurant at the lowest floor of Globus, within the Delicatessa supermarket. I went there today with my wife for lunch, and only one table was still available. However, just after us, a Globus employee arrived with some “friends”,...More

review_data.title: Nice department store, great location, love the food selection
review_data.content: Nice department store, great location, love the food selection (not talking about the restaurant here, but the department store...) I've been a long term customer of Globus'. Both Bellevue and Bahnhofstrasse. You pretty much always find something special to buy or what you're looking for....More

review_data.title: Na ja....für ein Törtchen
review_data.content: Na ja....für ein Törtchen Fr. 8.50 mit 1 1/2 Zwetschgen darauf zu verlangen ist sehr stolz. Auch für Zürcher Verhältnisse....More

review_data.title: Good food in a department store!
review_data.content: I stopped for a quick snack, and I have been positively hit by the quality of the food they served. Nice ambiance, at the top of the building, with a small terrace, all around it.

review_data.title: Everything under one roof - department store & food hall
review_data.content: I had not been in Zurich for several years so I wanted a quick overview to see what had changed in retailing and Globus is ideal for that purpose. Not only can you visit the usual department fashion floors etc, but in the basement; the...More

review_data.title: Great in-shop bar
review_data.content: What a great idea to have this oyster and sushi bar in a gourmet shop! Fresh oysters, great wine and excellent service

review_data.title: Wide variations
review_data.content: We came for after dinner drinks and sweets. The are several bars with a wide variation of food. All service personnel was very friendly. Coffees tasted great and the large chocolate cake unfortunately a bit dry. Need to test the other nice sweets next time....More

review_data.title: Konditorei Fleischli
review_data.content: Wenn Sie bei Fleischli im Globus Wienergebaeck kaufen kontrollieren Sie die Verpackung genau, diese koennte von Maeusen angeknappert sein!

review_data.title: A restaurant in a gourmet shop
review_data.content: We had here some excellent oysters, while shopping. A very nice concept and a friendly and efficient staff. Many thanks!

review_data.title: Gourmet solo at supermarket Faboulous !
review_data.content: If you are looking for the best of best ..? This is the place. The freshest, nicer and quite as good delicious food. You cannot resist to buy meat, fish all gourmet foods . Expensive,yes very expensive! But you can be confident of the quality...More

review_data.title: Oysters and Champagne
review_data.content: A short visit to the store, but something you have to do at least once, if there is space to be seated. It is generally busy but the seats readily become available. Keep trying.... Oysters & Champagne for my girlfriend and Sushi for myself -...More

review_data.title: Excellent shop
review_data.content: Globus is my favourite department store of all the once I have visited, it's not as big as Harrods in London, but definitely as classy and the deli is absolutely superb, very high quality Swiss standard. I love coming back and have a browse through...More

review_data.title: Delusione
review_data.content: 2 insalate 2 acqua 2 panini self-service 74 franchi..roba da matti ..niente di speciale con personale senza motivazione.....................

review_data.title: Enjoyed my visit!
review_data.content: Nicely presented store, very chic looking. The jewelry section was well presented and the store was well staffed! Not here for food!

review_data.title: reparto cibo magnifico
review_data.content: il top assoluto del cibo, hanno salmoni ottimi, salumi fantastici (5j spagnolo) e vini d'elite, perfino caffe' calabrese mauro che...More

review_data.title: Check out the Food Hall Downstairs
review_data.content: I love Globus stores. The clothing and cosmetics are high quality (if limited) but as an American, I enjoy strolling through the little gourmet area on the lower floor. It's always fun to see the different food packaging, wines and produce. Globes stores generally have...More

review_data.title: A weekend trip !
review_data.content: The food is great , the shop has fresh ingredients it's good to have a long or also short lunch . It has a good location because after a walk in the park near it, you go and eat .

review_data.title: Nice shop
review_data.content: Nice shopping centre. Can not say that it is outstanding but for keen shoppers you up fore a treat. The place has a nice restaurant and all you want to buy is there. I would recommend perfume section for man who want to please his...More

review_data.title: Nice Food Area
review_data.content: 8.6.17 Nice Food Area with Desserts as well. Serves several types of food so you may pick and choose according to your hunger at the time. the Doctor hit me with some LOVE and a HELPFUL VOTE! 👍

review_data.title: Great dessert
review_data.content: We stopped in for desserts and coffee after dinner on our way back to the hotel. We picked a selection of pastries to share. We also had ice cream. It was delicious. The coffee was great too.

review_data.title: Gute Asia Küche
review_data.content: Sehr gutes Essen, es könnte bischen mehr am Teller sein, aber qualitativ top. Schönes Ambiente und schneller Selfservice.

review_data.title: Visita

review_data.title: Food Shopping - Cüpli im Frühling
review_data.content: Top Adresse, bei der man auch praktisch alles findet: Globus 1. UG. Die Delicatessa lässt jedes Gourmetherz höher schlagen. Auch...More

review_data.title: Lunch as if on a market place
review_data.content: At first it seemed slightly odd to sit down for lunch in the middle of the food department - but the food looked irresistibly good (and when our risotto plates came, they really did look just as good as in the photographs on the iPad...More

review_data.title: Food, cappuccino, etc
review_data.content: We have had a cappuccino, hot chocolate, and something sweet for around 20 Swiss francs. Second time we had some pizza (6.50 Swiss francs) and some Asian food (20 Swiss francs). Good food and nice location overall. I was confused about the Asian food. I...More

review_data.title: Quick lunch
review_data.content: Had quick lunch in the globus delicatessa super market. Bollinger with oysters... very yummi!!! Easy, fast, high quality food!!! Always love going there!!!

review_data.title: Check out the amazing grocery section
review_data.content: This is the type of store that has the best and freshest seafood and produce. When I was there they had a sale on Truffles - both white and black. They looked amazing. Some of the readymade salads were very good. I tried both the...More

review_data.title: legal mais um pouquinho caro
review_data.content: Vale a pena a visita. Mas achamos que os preços ficaram um pouco caros relação a nossa moeda. Vale a...More

review_data.title: Elegant store
review_data.content: Everything they have looks 10x better next to the beautiful furnishings. The building and interior itself is worthy of a second look. I enjoyed using their restroom as well.

review_data.title: Excellent Shopping....
review_data.content: This store rivals most globally and reminded us of a mini-Harrod's... certainly not inexpensive, but a huge variety of unique accessories, perfumes, food, deli items, flowers, jewelry, home goods. Boutique style displays and excellent chocolates and grocery section downstairs. Did not even make it to...More

review_data.title: Luxury-Shopping mitten in Zürich
review_data.content: Naja Globus ist kult - vor allem seine Foodabteilung. Aber wenn man scho da ist dann geht man gern in...More

review_data.title: Ottimo caffè con bon bon
review_data.content: In centro abbiamo preso due caffè espressi, non male, con cioccolatino fantastico incluso. Anche la brioche non era malaccio, all'interno...More

review_data.title: Exzellente Tartelettes, gute asiatische Küche, drinnen und draussen super!
review_data.content: Für einen schnellen Kaffee mit tollen Kuchen oder ein Küppli an der Bar, asiatische Tellergerichte, ich gehe immer gerne hin....More

review_data.title: Edel Fast Food ohne Makel
review_data.content: Alle Speisen sind hochwertig und frisch. Ohne PiiPaaPoo kann man hier etwas Gesundes essen und am Abend auch einmal alleine...More

review_data.title: Unique Place to Shop & Find Food
review_data.content: Not your cheapest place to shop and eat, but the selection is memorable. Make sure to have some extra Swiss Francs to go downstairs to their Deli; you won't be disappointed but your budget might get a dent.

review_data.title: Not to be missed while in Zürich
review_data.content: One of my favorite stores anywhere. It competes well with Berlin's KaDeWe. Delightful choices, prices not terrible, and easy to develop favorites that you will want again and again. Tom ka gai is always as is the entive asian range of foods, love the champagne...More

review_data.title: Too packed at lunch time
review_data.content: We prefer Globus on Bahnhofstrasse. It isn't that crowded. There are more offers at Bellevue with various cuisines and a heavy blend of smells overrunning your noses.

review_data.title: Excellent wine-selection and delicatessen
review_data.content: Don't miss this this foodhall in the cellar of the Globus department-store. If you leave this place without buying anything - you have a really strong caracter! Temptations!

review_data.title: Прекрасные виды!
review_data.content: Отличный ресторан! Погуляли по торговому центру GLOBUS, потом поднялись на последний этаж и выпили там отличный кофе и вкуснейший штрудель,...More

review_data.title: Good sushi bar
review_data.content: Quite expensive and not really japanese (no japanese masters around) the sushi bar is managed by a caviar company. It is a "running sushi" of very high quality. Depending on the time of the day you ra ether (it's open and serving all day) you...More

review_data.title: Loja excelente de variedades
review_data.content: Adoro ir na Globus, porque tem mil coisas interessantes. Perfumes, bolsas, roupas, mil acessórios, maquiagem, tudo de bom e interessante...More

review_data.title: быстро и вкусно
review_data.content: неплохое место для обеда "по пути". Быстро и вкусно. Находится в самом центре, так что мимо не пройдете. Мне понравилась...More

review_data.title: Great sushi bar
review_data.content: We had sushi here one evening - the fish is very good quality. It is all freshly made. There is wine available by the glass and if you ask they will also make you sashimi - that was really good.

review_data.title: Refeições rápidas
review_data.content: Restaurante variado para refeições rápidas. Saladas, sanduiches, comida oriental, tortas e doces, chocolates, café ou somente um sorvete, são muitas...More

review_data.title: Für Frühaufsteher
review_data.content: Entgegen dem neuen Colana auf dem neuen Sechseläuten-Platz und dem Schiller, ist das Globus Restaurant bereits um 8h schon offen....More

review_data.title: Nicht 1. Klasse
review_data.content: Wir waren schon mehrmals in diesem Restaurant. Eine Mischung aus Fast Food und Restaurant. Selbstbedienung ist das Credo. Das Essen...More

review_data.title: Gutes Essen unfreundlicher Service
review_data.content: Nach mehrmaligem Mittagessen kann ich nur sagen ausgezeichnet. Leider ist der Service sehr lausig. Schade, habe das Restaurant trotz ausgezeichnetem...More

review_data.title: Fast food on steroids
review_data.content: Globus Bellevue is one of those places you can always rely on for a quick good quality meal. Food is always fresh and the choice between different kitchens is great. Nice tables both inside and outside.
